title: The tech behind ankle monitors
description:
Electronic monitoring, often in the form of ankle bands, is on the rise within the criminal justice system—it’s viewed by some as a simple alternative to incarceration, but what impact does this tech really have on people's lives?

Featuring:
@shubhabala

Links:
Use of Electronic Offender-Tracking Devices Expands Sharply

Digital Jail: How Electronic Monitoring Drives Defendants Into Debt 
 
Electronic Monitoring Technology Must Be Regulated

Active electronic monitoring a viable alternative to pretrial detention

What is E-Carceration? 

The Newest Jim Crow: Recent criminal justice reforms contain the seeds of a frightening system of “e-carceration.” 

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
